root.name: Speedway! / Spin-Out! / Crypto-Logic!
root.description: This pack consists of 3 games: Race The player must drive as far as he can in 2 minutes while avoiding the opponent cars. Crashing into them gives a time penalty. Spin-out 2 players race each other around the track. There are 2 tracks and 2 speeds. CryptogramOne player types a word. The letters are then scrambled and the 2nd player must try to unscramble it making as few mistakes as possible.
